reviewText: The storyline was interesting and the film had some good scenery that added to it.  I thought the actors did a good job with their roles.
I love Brian Bloom!  He was on as the world turns in the late 80's as dusty.  I thought this was a great movie.

When Brian was on As The World Turns as Dusty Donavan i never would have thought he would be making good movies and here's another one.

  Rondall

I loved this movie although the story lines were left hanging. THe main story line of the attempted murder was solved but it did leave others hanging. How ever Brain Bloom and Micheal Pare were so fantastic in this that I didn't really care if parts were not resolved. I loved this movie excellant with 2 gorgeous hunks in it.
What more could a girl ask for??"
